current_step_description: Successfully implemented Task 6: Implement Server Clone Cleanup from plan.md using TDD methodology (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR). Added comprehensive test suite with 6 test cases covering cleanup functionality, configuration handling, error recovery, multiple directories, and logging. Implemented thread-safe directory tracking in workflow instances, enhanced Cleanup() method with clone repository removal, and graceful error handling. All tests pass, build verifies successfully, and functionality meets all acceptance criteria.
